plans.title: Pixel Basic
plans.description: For individuals working on their next big project.
features: Fully responsive, custom website and hosting

plans.title: Pixel Advanced
plans.description: For small businesses crafting their digital footprint.

plans.title: Pixel Premium
plans.description: For established businesses wanting to scale their digital presence.

commonFeatures: From initial consultation to website deployment within three weeks for all sites.
Initial 60-minute meeting to discuss website needs and customization for all tiers.
On request updates to content, shops, information color schemes and typography.
Veterans and clients with disabilities qualify for a 15% discount on the initial and ongoing fees. Verification is required.
Satisfaction guarantee: If you are unsatisfied, refunds are guaranteed within 14 days after website launch. Will migrate and show you how to access the site.
